Name: Pedro Gilberto
description:
Pedro Gilberto is a hardworking man who is 69 years old. He has a live-in partner and lives in Cogri. He studied up to high school and makes a living by growing avocado in the zone of Laje where he has a small plot of land.

He has been in this line of work with his partner for the last few years so that they can earn income for housing, food, and health expenses. He is requesting a loan so that he can purchase compost and fertilizer for his avocado crop. This will allow him to earn more income.

Pedro Gilberto hopes to continue enjoying good health and growing avocados so that he can have income coming in from sales. He also hopes to improve his quality of life.
